text: The name Plaxton Expressliner or National Expressliner can mean one of three designs of coach built by Plaxton for National Express use: * The first Expressliner was a Plaxton Paramount III 3500 for National Express use, It didn't have a rear window and it had the National Express logo. * The Expressliner II was a Plaxton Premiere 350, The side windows were higher up and it had the National Express logo. * The Paragon Expressliner is a Plaxton Paragon. Expressliner
title: Plaxton Expressliner
